Description:
Identifies when a Point-to-site VPN is Modified or Deleted.

Author: Austin Songer @austinsonger
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Azure Point-to-site VPN Modified or Deleted
Query: sourcetype="azure-activitylogs" (operationname="MICROSOFT.NETWORK/P2SVPNGATEWAYS/WRITE" OR operationname="MICROSOFT.NETWORK/P2SVPNGATEWAYS/DELETE" OR operationname="MICROSOFT.NETWORK/P2SVPNGATEWAYS/RESET/ACTION" OR operationname="MICROSOFT.NETWORK/P2SVPNGATEWAYS/GENERATEVPNPROFILE/ACTION" OR operationname="MICROSOFT.NETWORK/P2SVPNGATEWAYS/DISCONNECTP2SVPNCONNECTIONS/ACTION" OR operationname="MICROSOFT.NETWORK/P2SVPNGATEWAYS/PROVIDERS/MICROSOFT.INSIGHTS/DIAGNOSTICSETTINGS/WRITE")
